data.title: MAIDSTONE. A MYSTERY. Signed
data.meta_description: New York: Signet, 1971 . 1st Edition. Soft cover. Signed by Author s . First Edition, first printing of this paperback original Signed by Norman Mailer on the half-title. Publisher's pictorial stiff card wrappers with the slightest of use at the extremities. A screenplay, adapted into film by Mailer, based on The Armies of the Night, winner of the Pulitzer Prize and National Book Award.
data.text:
New York: Signet, (1971).

1st Edition. Soft cover. Signed by Author(s). First Edition, first printing of this paperback original Signed by Norman Mailer on the half-title. Publisher's pictorial stiff card wrappers with the slightest of use at the extremities. A screenplay, adapted into film by Mailer, based on The Armies of the Night, winner of the Pulitzer Prize and National Book Award. With details of the filming, colour stills and an essay on filmmaking. 12mo. 191 pp.
